name: Faro (Matt!)
description:
Description:

Dark clouds swallowed the sun long ago, now only the lighthouses can keep people safe against the perils of the night. A short text adventure. 

Team:

Writing by Federico Tiblias, Maria Vittoria Maiello and me

Art by Marco Nurisso 

Software:

Game engine: Ren'Py

Art: Procreate 

Music: freesound.org, pixabay.com
